Posts.Content: I am so glad to see that others have the same complaints as me--I thought I must be the only one who feels this bad. The pain in my wrists, thumbs and up my arms is almost unbearable. I can't rotate my wrists or move them up and down without pain. My Dr. just looks at me like"it can't be that bad". Makes me want to scream! Have you found any relief for the pain--physical therapy, massage, anything?
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Aromasin

Posts.Content: I've been on Arimidex, Aromasin and Femara--had bad, bad side effects. Now am supposed to try Tamoxifen. Would like to hear if anyone else has gone this direction and what I can expect. Maybe I'll just have to switch back and forth from one to the other until I can't stand the side effects.
